alert.note: Alert for Dunklin; Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 12:10PM CDT until April 05 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Greene County in eastern Arkansas... Eastern Craighead County in eastern Arkansas... Central Poinsett County in eastern Arkansas... Mississippi County in eastern Arkansas... Southwestern Pemiscot County in southeastern Missouri... Southern Dunklin County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 100 PM CDT. * At 1210 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Leachville to near Trumann to near Harrisburg, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Blytheville, Osceola, Trumann, Gosnell, Manila, Marked Tree, Harrisburg, Steele, Lake City, Leachville, Lepanto, Bay, Brookland, Monette, Caraway, Keiser, Cardwell, Hornersville and Arbyrd. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...and southeastern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...and southeastern Missouri.
